New Records: The Cleveland Cavaliers have started the 2024-25 season with a 10-0 record, the best start in franchise history.
Key Match Events: The Cavaliers dominated the 7-1 Golden State Warriors, winning 136-117, with a score of 83-42 at halftime.
Pre-Game Insights: The Cavaliers are off to the best start in franchise history, with a dominant performance against the Warriors.
Post-Match Reflections: The Cavaliers' start has made the author question if it's wise to stick with the notion that they're not a true title contender.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cavaliers are playing offense at an unheard-of level, with an offense rating of 122.7, the highest in the league.
Others: The author compares the Cavaliers' start to the 2021 Utah Jazz team, which won 52 of 72 games but flamed out in the postseason.
